Service Details: - Provides monthly housing information sessions to seniors regarding the continuum of housing and care- Interior Health staff will be on hand to answer questions about assisted living and residential care- Provides S.A.F.E.R. applications, assistance with completion of forms and applications for housing and benefits to maintain secure housing at weekly drop-in sessions
Meetings: - Info Session:  2nd Thu each month @ 10:00am; please call to register- Weekly Drop-in:  Tue @ 1:00pm - 3:00pm
